message.content:
{"id": "2694", "title": "Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions", "description": "Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions

The editor selection dialog needs the following improvements:
a. Enable multiple selection
b. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as (default)
c. Add a width hint for the dialog
d. Investigate why the File editors Preference page grows in height when selected, unlike other pages.

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) - Also:
f. Need a width hint for the dialog
g. Why does the File editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) - Fixes for a, c, f, g need to be released.

MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06) - Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to the WorkbenchFile Editors preference page
2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors', go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to Internal Editors
4. Press OK

This action adds the selected external editor.", "OB": "The editor selection dialog should allow multiple selection.", "EB": "Add the ability to select multiple editors in the editor selection dialog.", "SR": "Improve the usability of the editor selection dialog by enabling users to select multiple editors."}
